member.name: M:OpenTK.Utilities.Interop.CreateWindowInfo(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Creates an object which implements the IWindowInfo interface for the platform currently running on. This will create a handle for the control, so it is not recommended that this be called in the constructor of a custom control.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Utilities.Interop.CreateWindowInfo(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates an object which implements the IWindowInfo interface for the platform currently running on.
member.param: The handle to the control, obtained from Control.Handle.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.VboTextPrinter
member.summary: Provides text printing through OpenGL 1.5 vertex buffer objects.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.ITextPrinterImplementation
member.summary: Defines the interface for TextPrinter implementations.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.VboTextHandle
member.summary: Contains the necessary information to print text through the VboTextPrinter implementation.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle
member.summary: Represents a handle to cached text.

member.name: F:OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle.Handle
member.summary: The handle of the cached text. Call the OpenTK.Graphics.ITextPrinter.Draw() method to draw the text represented by this TextHandle.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle.ToString
member.summary: Returns a System.String that represents the current TextHandle.
member.returns: a System.String that descibes the current TextHandle.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.ITextPrinter
member.summary: Defines the interface for a TextPrinter.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter
member.summary: Provides methods to perform layout and print hardware accelerated text.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new DefaultLayoutProvider object.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.CheckNeededFunctionality
member.summary: Checks the machine's capabilities and selects the fastest method to print text.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Prepare(System.String,OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont,OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle@)
member.summary: Prepares text for drawing.
member.param: The font to use for drawing.
The handle to the cached text. Use this to draw the text with the Draw() function.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Prepare(System.String,OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont,OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle@,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prepares text for drawing.
member.param: The font to use for drawing.
The handle to the cached text. Use this to draw the text with the Draw() function.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Prepare(System.String,OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont,OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle@,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Drawing.StringAlignment)
member.summary: Prepares text for drawing.
member.param: The font to use for drawing.
The handle to the cached text. Use this to draw the text with the Draw() function.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Prepare(System.String,OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont,OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle@,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Drawing.StringAlignment,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prepares text for drawing.
member.param: The font to use for drawing.
The handle to the cached text. Use this to draw the text with the Draw() function.
member.exception: Occurs when OpenGL 1.1 is not supported.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Draw(OpenTK.Graphics.TextHandle)
member.summary: Draws the cached text referred to by the TextHandle.
member.param: The TextHandle to the cached text.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Draw(System.String,OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont)
member.summary: Draws dynamic text without caching. Not implemented yet!
member.param: The OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont to draw the text in.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.Begin
member.summary: Sets up OpenGL state for drawing text.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextPrinter.End
member.summary: Restores OpenGL state.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.DisplayListTextPrinter
member.summary: Provides text printing through OpenGL 1.1 Display Lists.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.#ctor(System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Constructs a new TextureFont object, using the specified System.Drawing.Font.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.PrepareTexturePacker
member.summary: Calculates the optimal size for the font texture and TexturePacker, and creates both.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.LoadGlyphs(System.String)
member.summary: Prepares the specified glyphs for rendering.
member.param: The glyphs to prepare for rendering.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.LoadGlyph(System.Char)
member.summary: Prepares the specified glyph for rendering.
member.param: The glyph to prepare for rendering.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.LoadGlyph(System.Char,OpenTK.Math.Box2@)
member.summary: Adds a glyph to the texture packer.
member.param: An OpenTK.Math.Box2 that will hold the data for this glyph.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.GlyphData(System.Char,System.Single@,System.Single@,OpenTK.Math.Box2@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns the characteristics of a loaded glyph.
member.param: The character corresponding to this glyph.
The height of this glyph (line spacing).
The bounding box of the texture data of this glyph.
The handle to the texture that contains this glyph.
member.returns: True if the glyph has been loaded, false otherwise.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.MeasureString(System.String,System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Measures the width of the specified string.
member.param: If true, adds space to account for glyph overhangs. Set to true if you wish to measure a complete string. Set to false if you wish to perform layout on adjacent strings.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.MeasureString(System.String,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Measures the width of the specified string.

seealso.cref: !:public void MeasureString(string str, out float width, out float height, bool accountForOverhangs)

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.Height
member.summary: Gets a float indicating the default line spacing of this font.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.Width
member.summary: Gets a float indicating the default line spacing of this font.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.TextureFont.Texture
member.summary: Gets the handle to the texture were this font resides.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph
member.summary: Represents a single character of a specific Font.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.#ctor(System.Char,System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Constructs a new Glyph that represents the given character and Font.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.Equals(OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph)
member.summary: Compares the current Glyph with the given Glyph.
member.returns: True if both Glyphs represent the same character of the same Font, false otherwise.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.Character
member.summary: Gets the character represented by this Glyph.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.Font
member.summary: Gets the Font of this Glyph.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.Width
member.summary: Gets an integer representing the width of the Glyph in pixels.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Graphics.Glyph.Height
member.summary: Gets an integer representing the height of the Glyph in pixels.
